participant_1.background:
I don't really care about social media, I prefer to spend my time doing other things.
i like to take my dog for long walks.
i like listening to all genres of music except country music.

I'm not married, but I love my new sweater.

participant_2.background:
I'm the only one in my family who has crazy hair.
i enjoy playing computer games.
I'm looking for a home with a big yard for my pets to play in and a kitchen where I can cook my favorite Mexican food.
i cannot choose between lollipops and rainbows.
I've been in the best shape of my life thanks to regular exercise.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello!
How's your day going?
It's going well! I just got back from a walk with my dog.
I love taking my dog for walks! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever. He's the sweetest dog ever.
Golden retrievers are great dogs! I've always wanted one.
They're the perfect family dog. They're so loving and friendly.
What are some of your favorite things to do?
I love to play computer games, cook, and spend time with my family.
Those are all great things to do! I love to cook too. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to cook Mexican food. My family is Mexican and I grew up eating it all the time.
Mexican food is so good! I love tacos and burritos.
Me too! I love all Mexican food.
What do you like to do for exercise?
I like to go for walks, run, and lift weights.
I love to go for walks too! I like to go on trails and explore new places.
That sounds like fun! I usually just walk around my neighborhood.
That's still good exercise! I need to get more regular with my exercise.
It's never too late to start!
I know, I know. I'll start tomorrow!
Good for you!
